title: The Rainbow bear
creator_credit: Bill Melendez Productions, American Educational Films and Bill Melendez
brief_description: The Rainbow Bear awakes after 400 years of hibernation and takes a walk on the rainbow. Animated story incorporating both verse and prose with elements of impressionistic surrealism. Drawings and written by Robert Merz.
